name: 黃士嘉
objective:
Electric circuits course focusing on circuits design consists of the following topics:
1.CIRCUIT VARIABLES
2.CIRCUIT ELEMENTS
3.SIMPLE RESISTIVE CIRCUITS
4.TECHNIQUES OF CIRCUIT ANALYSIS
5.THE OPERATIONAL AMPLIFIER
6.INDUCTANCE, CAPACITANCE, AND MUTUAL INDUCTANCE
7.RESPONSE OF FIRST-ORDER RL AND RC CIRCUITS
8.NATURAL AND STEP RESPONSES OF RLC CIRCUITS
9.SINUSOIDAL STEADY–STATE ANALYSIS
schedule:
1.CIRCUIT VARIABLES (1week)
2.CIRCUIT ELEMENTS (1week)
3.SIMPLE RESISTIVE CIRCUITS (1week)
4.TECHNIQUES OF CIRCUIT ANALYSIS (1 week)
5.THE OPERATIONAL AMPLIFIER (2 weeks)
6.INDUCTANCE, CAPACITANCE, AND MUTUAL INDUCTANCE (2 weeks)
7.RESPONSE OF FIRST-ORDER RL AND RC CIRCUITS (2 weeks)
8.NATURAL AND STEP RESPONSES OF RLC CIRCUITS(3 weeks)
9.SINUSOIDAL STEADY–STATE ANALYSIS　　(3 weeks)
materials:
Electric Circuits, 8th Edition, Nilsson and Riedel
